# this command calls xcodebuild giving the name of the project directory # as the project to build and parses the output for file/line information echo '' xcodebuild 2>/dev/null -project `basename $TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY`.xcode -buildstyle Deployment \ | perl -pe 's/^(([^:]*\/)?([^\/:]+)):((\d+):)?/$3<\/a>:/' \ | perl -pe 's/\n/
/'
